block-definition.s: draw sms, x: %'x' y: %'y' color %'is authored' height: %'height'

custom-block.s: draw sms, x: %s y: %s color %b height: %s

block-definition.comment: This block takes a string of text as input and reports the same text but with all of the lowercase letters changed to uppercase.
This block takes a string of text as input and reports the same text but with all of the uppercase letters changed to lowercase.

scripts.comment: Then the map block calls the join and emojify word block on each of the words.
That map operation results in a list with the transformed words. Click the block below to see it.
Thanks to the outer join block, that list gets joined together into the final transformed phrase.
These are the blocks inside the emojify block, but with a phrase instead of an input parameter. Interact with each of the blocks inside to see how they each work.
First the split block splits the phrase into words
